title: 3.3 Master Challenge 1
question:
Prepare a presentation on Sources of light as shown below.
1. Add animation to all the objects in the natural sources group.
2. Select all the objetcs under the artifi cial sources and apply animation on them together.
3. Add a motion path to the objects.
